trans-unit.source: Represents the <see langword="extension" /> element from XML Schema as specified by the World Wide Web Consortium (W3C).
trans-unit.target: Representa o elemento <see langword="extension" /> do esquema XML, conforme especificado pelo W3C (World Wide Web Consortium).

trans-unit.source: This class is for complex types with complex content model derived by extension.
trans-unit.target: Essa classe é para tipos complexos com o modelo de conteúdo complexo derivado por extensão.

trans-unit.source: It extends the complex type by adding attributes or elements.
trans-unit.target: Ela estende o tipo complexo pela adição de elementos ou atributos.

trans-unit.source: See <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaComplexContent> for an example using this class.
trans-unit.target: Consulte <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaComplexContent> para obter um exemplo de uso dessa classe.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaComplexContentExtension" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaComplexContentExtension" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaAnyAttribute" /> component of the complex content model.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o componente <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaAnyAttribute" /> do modelo de conteúdo complexo.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaAnyAttribute" /> component of the complex content model.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaAnyAttribute" /> componente do modelo de conteúdo complexo.

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of attributes for the complex content.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a coleção de atributos do conteúdo complexo.

trans-unit.source: The collection of attributes for the complex content.
trans-unit.target: A coleção de atributos para o conteúdo complexo.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the complex type from which this type is derived by extension.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o nome do tipo complexo do qual esse tipo é derivado por extensão.

trans-unit.source: The name of the complex type from which this type is derived by extension.
trans-unit.target: O nome do tipo complexo do que esse tipo é derivado pela extensão.

trans-unit.source: The value must be a QName.
trans-unit.target: O valor deve ser um QName.

trans-unit.source: It is the name of the complex type specified by the base attribute of the `extension` element.
trans-unit.target: É o nome do tipo complexo especificado pelo atributo de base de `extension` elemento.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets one of the <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaGroupRef" />, <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaChoice" />, <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaAll" />, or <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSequence" /> classes.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define uma das classes <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaGroupRef" />, <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaChoice" />, <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaAll" /> ou <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSequence" />.

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaGroupRef" />, <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaChoice" />, <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaAll" />, or <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaSequence" /> classes.
